messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the handler implementation for App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\UserCommentController@index:

- app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/UserCommentController.php

Explanation and how I found it
- The routes file (routes/api.php) registers the route via Route::apiResource('users.comments', UserCommentController::class)->only('index'), which maps GET /v1/users/{user}/comments to App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\UserCommentController@index.
- I searched the codebase for the controller class and opened its source. The implementation is in app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/UserCommentController.php.
- The index method signature and body (excerpt) show the actual handler implementation:
  - public function index(Request $request, User $user): ResourceCollection
  - Returns CommentResource::collection($user->comments()->latest()->paginate($request->input('limit', 20)))
- No other files implement this handler; the route uses controller method routing (not a closure), so the single controller file above is the relevant implementation.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
